section.p: You wait until nightfall before approaching the villa. Its white, marbled walls seem to glow in the moonlight. Four guards patrol the perimeter.
‘Psst! a voice hisses from the darkness, and Luroc Bans steps up beside you. He is dressed completely in black, and is carrying a grappling iron.
‘We go in over the walls - there’s an inner courtyard. Floril will meet us inside. She should have got the keys to the vault by now. Just follow me.’

choices.choice: Pull out and warn Avar Hordeth
